synopsis.text: Shoujo Shuumatsu Ryokou's delightful spinoff presents the beloved characters Chito and Yuuri in an endearing, super-deformed style, taking viewers on a whimsical journey through an alternate realm. Streamed on Kadokawa's official YouTube channel, these shorts transport our duo from their post-apocalyptic world to a vibrant school setting. As they attend various classes, Chito and Yuuri offer a charming glimpse into what education might have been like when civilization still thrived, inviting us to explore the simple joys and wonders of learning in a relaxed, engaging atmosphere.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
